name: ExecutionService
description: Defines service methods run or reset a workflow.

methods.name: CanExecuteUpToHere
methods.description: Test if a given node can be executed (e.g. not yet executed and not executing).

params.description: The id of the workflow the node is in.
params.name: workflowID

params.description: The id of the node itself.
params.name: nodeID

methods.name: ExecuteUpToHere
methods.description: Trigger an execution of a single node or a chain of nodes (endpoint reference).

params.description: The id of the workflow the node is in.
params.name: workflowID

params.description: The id of the node itself.
params.name: nodeID
